events.message: The customer reported a recent car accident involving another vehicle at an intersection on April 30th.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to the collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and provide necessary guidance.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer, confirming receipt and next steps.
The customer has been asked to submit accident photos, police report, and their vehicle insurance papers.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos of the damaged car and official accident report.
Claims investigation initiated to verify the details of the collision and assess vehicle damage extent.
Investigation completed successfully; information confirms customer’s version and estimates repair costs.
A settlement offer for vehicle repairs has been proposed and shared with the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and agreed to proceed with repairs.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation report and customer agreement to settlement.
Payment to cover repair costs was issued promptly to the customer’s selected auto repair shop.
The claim has been closed successfully after the customer confirmed completion of vehicle repairs.
All claim documentation and correspondence have been archived as part of case closure procedures.
